Package org.apache.orb.CORBA.kernel

ORB loader incorporating component based management of initializers, log enablement, configuration and contextualization of the ORB and supporting services based on the Avalon component model.

See:
          Description

Class Summary
DefaultLoader The DefaultLoader provides support for the configuration of a new ORB instance based on default and supplied properties, and lifecycle processing of pluggable Initializers encountered during the configuration process.
 

Package org.apache.orb.CORBA.kernel Description

ORB loader incorporating component based management of initializers, log enablement, configuration and contextualization of the ORB and supporting services based on the Avalon component model.
